org.jetel.component.tree.reader

Interface TreeReaderParserProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlReaderParserProvider

    public interface TreeReaderParserProvider

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputAdapter getInputAdapter()
      Provides adapter which processes input provided by SourceIterator into a form understood by the XPathEvaluator provided by this instance (the "input" is is refereed to as "evaluationContext" in the XPathEvaluator).
      TreeStreamParser getTreeStreamParser()
      Provides parser which reads a tree of some concrete structure/format and during the process it generates evens which describe such a tree in a general way.
      ValueHandler getValueHandler()
      Provides a handler able to fill Clover data fields with some value read from a tree.
      XPathEvaluator getXPathEvaluator()
      Provides XPathEvaluator which evaluates XPath expressions directly on a tree of some concrete format.
      boolean providesTreeStreamParser()
      Indicates whether this instance provides TreeStreamParser.
      boolean providesXPathEvaluator()
      Signals if this instance provides XPathEvaluator.

    • Method Detail

      • providesTreeStreamParser

        boolean providesTreeStreamParser()
        Indicates whether this instance provides TreeStreamParser. One of providesTreeStreamParser() and providesXPathEvaluator() methods has to return true.
        Returns:
        true iff getTreeStreamParser() does not return null.

      • getTreeStreamParser

        TreeStreamParser getTreeStreamParser()
        Provides parser which reads a tree of some concrete structure/format and during the process it generates evens which describe such a tree in a general way. Used for conversions between tree formats. Called only if providesTreeStreamParser() returns true.
        Returns:
        tree parser.

      • getValueHandler

        ValueHandler getValueHandler()
        Provides a handler able to fill Clover data fields with some value read from a tree.
        Returns:
        a handler. Must not be null.

      • providesXPathEvaluator

        boolean providesXPathEvaluator()
        Signals if this instance provides XPathEvaluator. One of providesTreeStreamParser() and providesXPathEvaluator() methods has to return true.
        Returns:
        true iff getXPathEvaluator() does not return null.

      • getXPathEvaluator

        XPathEvaluator getXPathEvaluator()
        Provides XPathEvaluator which evaluates XPath expressions directly on a tree of some concrete format.
        Returns:
        an evaluator. Or null if providesXPathEvaluator() returns false.

      • getInputAdapter

        InputAdapter getInputAdapter()
        Provides adapter which processes input provided by SourceIterator into a form understood by the XPathEvaluator provided by this instance (the "input" is is refereed to as "evaluationContext" in the XPathEvaluator).
        Returns:
        an input adapter. Must not be null.
